messages.content: what's the best number that i can pay once for and keep forever that i can use to set up a new whatsapp number that will recieve 2fa texts?

content.text: what's the best number that i can pay once for and keep forever that i can use to set up a new whatsapp number that will recieve 2fa texts?

messages.content:
Getting a number that you can pay for once and keep forever specifically for WhatsApp 2FA texts is a smart approach. There are a few options available.

Based on what I understand about your needs, I'd recommend looking into a Google Voice number. It's a one-time setup (free in the US), and you can keep the number indefinitely as long as you use it occasionally. It works well for receiving 2FA texts including for WhatsApp.

If you want more privacy or Google Voice isn't available in your region, you might consider a prepaid SIM with a minimal plan that you can top up very infrequently just to keep the number active.

Would you like me to search for more specific information about the best options that would work for WhatsApp 2FA texts?
